title: IMAGE overview page
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see a list of all IMAGES\
So I can get a general idea of the different types that exist\
And by scrolling through them find interesting ones
description:
* The overview page displays a subset of all IMAGE nodes. → Status Code \`200\`
* When there exist more than 100 IMAGES then only the first 100 are displayed.
* The IMAGES are sorted `ascending` by their \`name\`.
* Each node is presented with its primary information.
* Each node contains a thumbnail image.
* Each node links to the respective IMAGE detail page.
* An error message is shown when there exist no IMAGE nodes (edge case, mainly relevant for testing purposes). → Status Code \`200\`
